name: Forest Spirit (Matt Daly)
description:
As a Forest Spirit, you and the trees are irrevocably linked. If you stray too far from the surrounding trees, your life-force will be depleted and the forest will begin to die.

THE OBJECTIVE

Protect the altar from the oncoming hordes. If the altar dies, so too will the forest (and; therefore, you). You are equipped with a simple wand, which shoots pellets that bounce around killing both enemies and trees. When an enemy dies, there is a chance for new life to grow in its place, allowing you to venture farther from the borders of the forest while still maintaining your connection to the trees.

UI LEGEND

Yellow Bar - altar health

Blue Line - the link between you and the nearest trees

The Rings:

    Blue Ring - the time you have been unlinked from the forest. If you are unlinked for too long, the forest will begin to die.

    Green Ring - your current health. It depletes when you are unlinked from the forest, and slowly regenerates when you are linked.

    Yellow Ring - the current cooldown on your wand.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D to move

Aim with mouse, left click to shoot
